questions.name: Rate yourself from 1 (least like me) - 5 (most like me) for the following statements.
rows: I reflect on my work and my actions on a regular basis when I'm studying.
After a study task, I reflect on what I've done well and what I could improve.
I think about tools and techniques that are useful to help me reflect.
I actively seek out feedback even in situations where it is not automatically offered.
When I receive feedback, I actively reflect on it.
Before I start a task, I look through feedback on similar tasks to see if there is any useful advice.
After I receive feedback, I discuss it with a friend or family member.
